title: After update of Pixel 4a to Android 11 DND setting now allows unstarred contacts to ring.
content: Our Pixel 4a's running Android 10 with Do Not Disturb (DND) activated always blocked UNSTARRED contacts from ringing.  This great feature no longer works after updating both of our new Pixel 4a's to Android 11.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
